Nurse: I'm sorry, could you please repeat the last part of your response?

Nurse: I'm sorry, I didn't quite catch that last part. Could you please repeat it?

Patient: Oh, I said yogurt.

Nurse: Ah, yogurt is a great choice! It's a good source of protein and can be a comforting food. Just remember to choose a low-fiber variety. This is one of those rare times when doctors want their patients to be eating low fiber comfort foods. Do you have any other questions about the diet?

Patient: Nope.

responses.gpt4: Alright, if you have any questions in the future, don't hesitate to ask. I'll make sure to send you a reminder about your dietary restrictions and medication instructions closer to your procedure date. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss in regards to your upcoming colonoscopy?
responses.our_model: Alright, if you have any questions in the future, don't hesitate to ask. Now, let's move on to the topic of supplements. You will also need to stop any supplements you take like Psyllium husk or any anti-diarrheal medications. Are you currently taking any supplements or anti-diarrheal medications?
